gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 130, Lakers 112
gameRecap.excerpt: Cam Thomas led the Nets with 33 points off the bench as Brooklyn defeated the Lakers, 130-112. Nic Claxon (22 points, 14 rebounds, two blocks) and Mikal Bridges (17 points, five assists) totaled 39 points in the win. Anthony Davis led the Lakers with 26 points, 12 rebounds, and six assists while LeBron James (24 points, 11 rebounds, five assists) and DAngelo Russell (20 points, seven assists) added 44 points. The Nets improve to 17-24 as the Lakers move to 21-22.
